title: Out of the total floor area proposed to be utilized for residential development, 20% of the same shall be built for residential tenements, each having BUA up to 50sq
clause_text: Out of the total floor area proposed to be utilized for residential development, 20% of the same shall be built for residential tenements, each having BUA up to 50sq. m.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone

source_pdf.text_snippet: Out of the total floor area proposed to be utilized for residential development, 20% of the same shall be built for residential tenements, each having BUA up to 50sq. m.
